name: Leegin Creative Leather Products, Inc. v. PSKS, Inc., dba Kay’s Kloset . . . Kay’s Shoes
court: Supreme Court of the United States

involvedParties.name: PSKS, Inc., dba Kay’s Kloset . . . Kay’s Shoes

reasoningForIncludingInOpinion.name: Dr. Miles Medical Co. v. John D. Park & Sons Co.
reasoningForIncludingInOpinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
reasoningForIncludingInOpinion.legalOpinion: It is per se illegal under § 1 of the Sherman Act for a manufacturer and its distributor to agree on the minimum price the distributor can charge for the manufacturer’s goods.

legalOpinion: Dr. Miles is overruled, and vertical price restraints are to be judged by the rule of reason.
